title: Congratulations, you’re all set!
content: Welcome to OnlyDust! You’re now ready to start your journey in our vibrant open-source community. Here are your next steps to get the most out of your experience:

submitProject.title: Submit a project
submitProject.content: Make your project public to attract contributors and collaborators.

exploreEcosystems.title: Explore ecosystems
exploreEcosystems.content: Discover other projects and communities within the ecosystem to gain insights and make connections.

applyGrant.title: Apply for a grant
applyGrant.content: Find sponsors to help finance and support your project.

exploreProjects.title: Explore projects
exploreProjects.content: Discover a variety of open-source projects tailored to your interests. Dive into the ones that excite you and match your skills.

joinProject.title: Join a project
joinProject.content: Find projects that need your expertise and start contributing. Collaborate with others and make an impact.

earnRewards.title: Earn rewards
earnRewards.content: Participate in projects and earn rewards for your contributions, there’s something for everyone.
